IsCurrentScreen(IScreen)

Retrieves whether an IScreen is the current screen. This will return false on all IScreens while a child IScreen is loading.

public static bool IsCurrentScreen(this IScreen screen)

Parameters

screen IScreen

The IScreen to check.

Returns

bool

True if screen is the current screen.

MakeCurrent(IScreen)

Makes an IScreen the current screen, exiting all child IScreens along the way.

public static void MakeCurrent(this IScreen screen)

Parameters

screen IScreen

The IScreen to make current.
